title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't set correct context for nested classes
OB: When a .java file is open in the editor and the new class button is clicked, the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click on the 'New Class' button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard.
